data: Part of a caduceus of the Adeonzinoi
part of a caduceus of the adeonzinoi
ISic003327. Part of a caduceus of the Adeonzinoi

Facsimile Images

Ἀδεονζίνο̄ν δαμόσ(ιον)

Apparatus criticus

Text after Ampolo and Robert

translation

commentary

The Adeonzinoi are not identified. Some scholars (e.g. Guarducci) have interpreted this piece as a weight, rather than as an element from a caduceus, but the attribution to a caduceus is generally accepted.
